required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PAthwAy of Dyspneic patIent in Emergency (PArADIsE)
clinical_study.official_title: PAthwAy of Dyspneic patIent in Emergency

brief_summary.textblock:
This is an observational retrospective single-center study (CHRU of Nancy) in patients cared for acute dyspnea by a medical team of the emergencies of the CHRU of Nancy.
The main purpose of the study is to evaluate the outcome of patients cared for acute dyspnea by a medical team of emergencies of CHRU of Nancy.

detailed_description.textblock: This observational retrospective single-center study will be conducted using data from medical records, acquired as part of usual care, patients cared for acute dyspnea in the last 5 years (from the date of authorization of data processing). About 4,000 patients will be affected, including more than 800 patients with acute heart failure.

secondary_outcome.measure: Demographic and clinical data of patients cared by a medical team of emergencies
Duration of total hospitalization (including emergency stay and conventional hospitalization)
The main diagnosis of the initial hospitalization
Administration of non-invasive ventilation and / or diuretics and / or nitrates
Administration time of non-invasive ventilation and / or diuretics and / or nitrates
Service type admitting the patient after the emergency care (intensive care, cardiology, intensive care cardiology, other ...)
Admission time in a service after the emergency care

arm_group.description: Patients with acute dyspnea treated by a medical team of emergencies of CHRU of Nancy. All patients admitted to the emergencies in the last 5 years matching the inclusion criteria will be evaluated. About 4,000 patients will be affected, including more than 800 patients with acute heart failure. (Figures based on export of ICD X codes (R06.0: Dyspnea) of patients cared in extra-hospital for acute dyspnea (diagnosis Dyspnea + Heart Failure) over the last 5 years).

study_pop.textblock: Patients with acute dyspnea cared by a medical team of emergencies of CHRU Nancy in the last 5 years.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Man or women â‰¥ 18 years
- Patients with acute dyspnea cared by a medical team of the emergencies of CHRU of Nancy.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Cardiorespiratory arrest before the care by a medical team of the emergencies of the CHRU of Nancy.
